kreport.name: newOnetimeResolveRate

condition.name: type
condition.extend: select v_o.type,decode(v_o.type,'分公司','业支',v_o.type) from v_org v_o where v_o.type in ('分部','分公司') and v_o.area in (${s@user_areas}) group by v_o.type,v_o.type_order order by v_o.type_order

data.tbody: ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4}%
data.tfoot: 合计 $[round(${2})] $[round(${3})] $[round(${3}*10000/${2})/100]%

kreport.ksql: --新一次性解决率 select replace(bn.org_name,'分公司','业支') 首派部门, nvl(data.sptotal,0) 首派工单数, nvl(data.onetimetotal,0) 一次性解决数, decode(data.sptotal,null,0,0,0,round(nvl(data.onetimetotal,0)*100/data.sptotal,2)) 一次性解决率 from ( select v_o.org_name,v_o.type_order,v_o.org_order from v_org v_o where v_o.type in ('分部','分公司') #[and v_o.type=${type}] #[and v_o.area in(${s@user_areas})] )bn, ( select v_o.org_name,count(*) sptotal,count(onetime.flowlsh) onetimetotal from sec_org o,v_org v_o, ( select f.flowlsh,n.executergrouporgid,n.nodecode,i.dispatchdest,row_number() over(PARTITION BY f.flowlsh order by n.gendate) rn from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode in ( '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858', --IT分部接口 '8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', --业务支持中心接口 '8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30', --厂家处理 '95e87c590a112268017f3be1d42c0688' --省IT中心科室处理 ) and f.startercode='8a92634621adf5510121ae02a34f0003' --10000号主办单 #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] ) sp, ( select flowlsh from ( select f.flowlsh,count(distinct n.executergrouporgid) num from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode in ( '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858', --IT分部接口 '8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', --业务支持中心接口 '8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30', --厂家处理 '95e87c590a112268017f3be1d42c0688' --省IT中心科室处理 ) and f.startercode='8a92634621adf5510121ae02a34f0003' --10000号主办单 #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] group by f.flowlsh ) where num=1 ) onetime where sp.executergrouporgid=o.id and sp.flowlsh=onetime.flowlsh(+) and o.org_code like v_o.org_code||'%' and sp.rn=1 and sp.nodecode=decode(sp.dispatchdest,'YZ','8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858') group by v_o.org_name ) data where bn.org_name=data.org_name(+) order by bn.type_order,bn.org_order
kreport.comment: 报表说明： 1) 一次性解决率报表统计10000号主办单的一次解决情况； 2) 一次性解决率=一次性解决单数/首派单数×100%； 3) 首派单数是10000号系统首派给某工单处理部门的10000号主办单数； 4) 一次性解决单数是首派单数里在首派部门直接解决回单，没有转其他部门处理的工单。在首派部门内部多次流转， 没有转派其他部门处理的工单也计算在一次性解决单数；
